how do you address someone specifically in here, in chat, without having to type thier whole name?
In XChat use the top menu: XChat -> New -> Server Tab
That will open a new server tab. Then in that new server tab, just type /server address.of.server
Or, in that new tab, click XChat -> Network List.. and use that.
Well, after apt-get runs unless there was a problem it will just exit and bring you back to your terminal (The dollar sign $)

I dont' use Clementine but you probably just have to open it's settings and point it to your music on your computer, like the directory it's in.
By default it probably just isn't looking in the particular directory (Folder) your music is stored on your computer.
Well, I'm not familiar with Clementine sorry. Where on your hard drive is your music, do you know the path?

So in Clementine click on Settings (If you're using Ubuntu you'll have to push your mouse to the top of the screen to see the File | Edit | Settings menus) and then in Settings, click on Music Library tab
In there, you will point Clementine to the folder on your hard drive your music is in.
